threads.description: Maximum number of CPU threads to use per workflow task.
threads.help_text: Several tasks in this workflow benefit from using multiple CPU threads. This option sets the number of CPU threads for all such processes. The total CPU resource used by the workflow is constrained by the executor configuration. See server threads parameter for kraken specific threads.

miscellaneous_options.title: Miscellaneous Options
miscellaneous_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.
